text: James Morris Lawson Jr. (September 22, 1928 - June 9, 2024) was an American activist and university professor. He was a leading peaceful activist within the Civil Rights Movement. During the 1960s, he served as a mentor to the Nashville Student Movement and the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee. Lawson died on June 9, 2024 at a hospital in Los Angeles, California from cardiac arrest at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * “The Rev.
